posts.title: 🔊 1.0.1 Patch Note
posts.body:
Gogo Racing Patch Notes

1.0.1 Patch Note

⚡ Revision was made on Product category, so expired products can't be install anymore.

⚡After purchasing fixed-term items, the expiration display has been modified to be displayed when the expiration date expires.

⚡ [Game Mode] It has been modified so that the sound is output when the back button is touched.

⚡ [Garage] The vehicle name display length has been modified.

⚡ Revised to remove expired characters and vehicles when updating inventory.

⚡ Fixed the alignment of the character above the in-game and the name display that were misplaced.

⚡ Added Tapjoy Shop Event icon and function.

⚡ Fixed an issue where store alignment did not work properly.

⚡ Modified the profile to expose character vehicle stats and skill information.

⚡ [Garage] We modified the items that is currently installing so that they are aligned at the front.

⚡ [Garage] If Players have more than one same paint, we have improved it to indicate the quantity on one item.

⚡ [Option] We adjusted the size of the web view window considering the sizes of the device.

⚡ [Option] Fix related to web view back Button issue

➡️ Add store data

➡️ Disable the Login Guest button

posts.title: 🔊 1.0.2 Patch Note
posts.body:
Gogo Racing Patch Notes

1.0.2 Patch Note

Hello GoGo Racers!

📢 📢📢 We have an update today, March 25, 2022! As we want to give you an amazing game, here are detailed patch notes:

📢 Fixed the type display on the paint and package in the purchase pop-up window.

📢 Correct the alignment in Iteam League that applies to the same team when using EMP.

📢 Activate the "Change Installation" button in the matching room.

📢 Modified the alignment of track difficulty level of each league that was displayed differently.

📢 Modified the text "cencel" ➡️ "cancel" in the system pop-up window

📢 Altered the basic animation of the practice character.

📢 Changed UI effects of results on the Time Attack Mode.

📢 Upcoming new car and character added in the shop.

📢 Correct the appearance of repeated acquisition when acquiring item boxes during Item League play

📢 Ingame distance calculation UI, modify function to operate until end of game

📢 Fixed the appearance that AI when the network is unstable.

📢 Changed the display: Pop-up window will be removed when all attendance compensation is obtained

📢 Established Account Linking on Google or Facebook Account.

📢 Fixed the animation on the ranking profile.

     📱 : You may download the game here: https://bit.ly/3JCuqTP

     🌐: To know more about our games visit:https://linktr.ee/BSSPH

posts.title: 🔊 1.0.3 Patch Note
posts.body:
Gogo Racing Patch Notes

1.0.3 Patch Note

Fix version informations:

⚡ Fixed incorrect game information version.

⚡ Modified game reward icon to appear differently when you lose the game.

⚡ Fixed vehicle change pop-up error in the matching room.

⚡ Added exception if the expired characters are installed.

⚡ Revised exception handling if the expired vehicle is installed.

⚡ Fixed sound setting: to prevent sound from coming out when the effect was turned off.

⚡ Fixed / Adjusted reward icon size.

⚡ Applied correction on the item acquisition effect when using magnetic field items.

⚡ Applied correction on turtle attack whereas the attack effect does not disappear when the shield is used.

⚡ Fixed Attendance Reward Pop-up.

⚡ Languages:

⚡ Added 7 new text translations: Japanese, Indonesian, Vietnamese, Thai, Spanish, French, and Italian.

➡️ Unavailable language is locked for processing.

➡️ Fixed issue where language is set automatically when the user moved to the lobby

posts.title: 🔊 1.0.4 Patch Note
posts.body:
Gogo Racing Patch Notes

1.0.4 Patch Note

Hello GoGo Racers!

📢📢📢 We have an update today, June 14, 2022! As we want to give you an amazing and exciting game, here are detailed patch notes:

⚙️ Unveiled a new character, a strict and arrogant chick named Bbi

⚙️ Added new cars, one is small and cute car called Minimi and a special car called Speedstar.

⚙️ Added six (6) new tracks:

 ➡️ GoGo Stadium

 ➡️ New Town

  ➡️ Lost Temple

  ➡️ Western Town

  ➡️ Clock Tower

  ➡️ Space City

⚙️ GoGo Racing has a total of 14 tracks as of the moment.

⚙️ Modified the packages on the shop. Items for each packages are already visible with images.

⚙️ Added a lobby chat

⚙️ Added a gacha system on the game.

⚙️ Added a Victory box on the lobby which can be obtained by getting 10 trophies.

⚙️ Added a Free box on the lobby that can be received every four (4) hours.

⚙️ Improved the performance and animations of the game.

⚙️ Improved the UI of the game.

⚙️ Fixed the bugs on the game.

authors.name: Luis Martinez
